name: rpp-portal
description: RPP Portal - ระบบจัดการพอร์ทัลแบบ Microservices

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:auth && npm run build:user && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install
